title: A Complete Theoretical Framework for Power-Law Galactic Rotation Curves: From Tsallis Non-Extensive Statistics to Observable Predictions
description: LaTeX source, figures, and references for the paper deriving power-law rotation curves from Tsallis non-extensive statistics, companion to the empirical EBC study. Includes proofs of uniqueness, predictive framework for q, validation on SPARC galaxies, and falsifiable lensing predictions.
